name: Wandrian
overview: Wandrian, Inc. develops technology solutions for next-generation systems in train travel distribution. The company offers private label customized Websites and widgets for small companies; enterprise solutions for large companies to manage their train travel products and commercial agreements; and all-inclusive API technologies for travel management companies or corporate travel platforms that interface with distributors and Websites to control details of the customer and user interfaces. Its solutions simplify the planning and purchasing of train travel. Wandrian, Inc.â€™s products include Wandrian Pro, an enterprise solution for travel agents and tour operators to access a range of train tickets and passes covering Europe, North America, Australia, and Asia; Wandrian Pro+ that offers control over the management and distribution of products, as well as provides reporting, agency support functions, supply management, pricing, payments, and commissions tracking capabilities; and Wandrian Pro API, which offers access to global train travel content. It also provides Wandrian referral that enables to integrate links, banners, and widgets into the Website; and Wandrian private label solution that enables to add train travel to the Website product mix, as well as offers pre and post customer and fulfillment services. Wandrian, Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Newton Centre, Massachusetts with additional offices in the United Kingdom and Australia.

funding_rounds.source_description: Brook invests $3.5 million in Wandrian, Inc
